description: A Java class representing the response payload for Todo entities, including fields like id, title, description, completion status, due date, and timestamps. It provides getter and setter methods and a static method to create an instance from a Todo entity.

classes.name: TodoResponse
classes.description: DTO class for transferring Todo data in API responses with Swagger annotations for documentation.

methods.name: fromEntity
methods.description: Creates a TodoResponse instance from a Todo entity by copying relevant fields.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the Todo.

methods.name: setId
methods.description: Sets the ID of the TodoResponse.

methods.name: getTitle
methods.description: Returns the title of the Todo.

methods.name: setTitle
methods.description: Sets the title of the TodoResponse.

methods.name: getDescription
methods.description: Returns the description of the Todo.

methods.name: setDescription
methods.description: Sets the description of the TodoResponse.

methods.name: isCompleted
methods.description: Returns whether the Todo is completed.

methods.name: setCompleted
methods.description: Sets the completion status of the TodoResponse.

methods.name: getDueDate
methods.description: Returns the due date of the Todo.

methods.name: setDueDate
methods.description: Sets the due date of the TodoResponse.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns when the Todo was created.

methods.name: getUpdatedAt
methods.description: Returns when the Todo was last updated.
